text: Bia is an Argentine telenovela produced by Pegsa y Non Stop for Disney Channel Latin America in collaboration with Disney Channel Europe, Middle East & Africa. It premiered on 24 June 2019. Its first season consisted of 60 episodes and concluded on 8 November 2019. The second season was released on 16 March 2020 and ended on 24 July 2020, once again consisting of 60 episodes. == Series overview == == Episodes == === Season 1 (2019) === === Season 2 (2020) === == Notes == == References == Category:Lists of Argentine television series episodes
title: List of Bia episodes
